"A.P.241/4/21/17:00": "1. Is your body okay?"
"2. Still thinking about her?"
"Good, good, it's good. It wasn't much of an injury anyway. I'm fine, see."
"I was just thinking about Kohri."
"Haha... You can see right through me, <%me>."
"Kohri was the kind of child who couldn't do anything. She was bad at sports, and really hated studying. She was completely out of touch with reality."
"But even if nothing went right, she'd always smile, and was always cheery, somehow."
"I first met Kohri after I entered high school. I met her through Mother Cluster."
"Honestly, at first, I thought that she was kind of dull."
"Because she was always following me, I thought she was kind of annoying."
"That's why I was cruel to her, at first. But she still followed me. She was like a puppy dog when she was around me."
"...I wonder when it was? It was around the time me and Kohri joined the student council."
"You see, Kohri was bullied a bit. Having her things hidden, or pranks with her desk... That sort of thing went on for a while."
"Even then, Kohri continued to laugh. In front of me, laughing like she was happy."
"...Even though it was my fault. She always continued to laugh."
"Yes, I was originally the one they bullied."
"Kohri realized I was being bullied and put a stop to it. Because of her intervention, the bullies moved on to Kohri."
"I didn't even realize it, and kept thinking of her as a pest."
"One day, I happened to run across Kohri being bullied."
"But then, she... looked my way, and laughed."
"Kohri laughed, like she always had."
"I finally understood that her laughter meant that she was pushing herself."
"She's out of touch, so... I didn't even realize it was a signal saying that she needed help."
"I got into a fight with those bullies. The teachers quickly found us and scolded all of us. It didn't happen again afterwards."
"After that, Kohri stuck to me even more, and I accepted it."
"Remember how Kohri was laughing the other day? She was laughing just like that day with the bullies."
"I can tell. She laughs like that when she needs help."
"It's the same as before... She's suffering, while trying to help me."
"That's why I have to help her..."
"Ow!"
"Sorry, you're right. It's not \"I\". It's \"we\". We have to help her, right?"

"<%me>さん！
あっ、ヒツギさんも一緒ですね！
……むむむ、これは私、お邪魔虫でしたか？"
"シエラ……茶化さなくていいから。"

"もう、ちょっとしたジョークですよー。
ヒツギさん、戻ってきてから落ち着いちゃって
エンガさんそっくりになりましたね。さすが兄妹。"

"えっ！？
高二の段階で、あんなスれた感じになるのはやだ！
あたしはもうちょっとバカがいい！"
"……言うじゃねえか、バカ妹。"

"げっ、兄さん……
ど、どうしてそんなところにいるのよ！"

"どーでもいいだろ、んなことは。
で、シエラさん、急いでいる感じだったが
どうしたんだ？"

"あ、そうです、そうでした！
エスカダーカーの反応が検知されたんです！"

"ちっ、また出てきやがったのか！
場所は！？"

"座標照合中……完了。
この座標って……天星学院高等学校！？
ヒツギさんたちの、学校ですよッ！"
